content: निर्वहणं {@--1@} End, completion; <ls>Śi. 14. 63.</ls> {@--2@} Maintainig, carrying to the end, sustaining; मानस्य निर्वहणं <ls>Amaru. 24.</ls> {@--3@} Destruction, annihilation. {@--4@} (In dramas). The catastrophe, the last stage in which the action of the play is brought to a head, the denouement; तत्किंनिमित्तं कुकविकृतनाटकस्येव अन्यन्मुखेऽन्यन्निर्वहणे <ls>Mu. 6.</ls>
